      • inputNames

        public static java.lang.String[][] inputNames(int i,
                                              java.util.Scanner in,
                                              int matCount,
                                              java.lang.String[][] matNamesUnit)
        Method to input the names of the materials.
        pre:
        post: The names are succesfully input into the program.
        Parameters:
        in - Scanner object that allows input to be captured. in != null.
        matCount - Integer that holds the ammount of materials to be inputed. matCount != String.
        matNamesUnit - String 2D array that holds 2 arrays, one with the names and the other with the meassure unit for each material. matNamesUnit != null && ∀x in matNamesUnit x != "".

      • quantityType

        public static int[][] quantityType(int i,
                                   java.util.Scanner in,
                                   int matCount,
                                   int[][] quantityPurpose)
        Method to input the quantities and types of each material.
        pre:
        post: The quantities and the types of each material are succesfully input into the program.
        Parameters:
        in - Scanner object that allows input to be captured. in != null.
        matCount - Integer that holds the ammount of materials to be inputed. matCount != String.
        quantityPurpose - Integer 2D array that holds 2 arrays, one with the quantity and the other with the purpose of each material. quantityPurpose != null && ∀x in quantityPurpose x != String.

      • inputPrices

        public static int[][] inputPrices(int i,
                                  java.util.Scanner in,
                                  java.lang.String[] matNames,
                                  int[][] prices)
        Gets the Prices per shop into the program.
        pre:
        post: The prices are now stored in the program.
        Parameters:
        in - Scanner object that allows input to be captured. in != null.
        matNames - String array that holds the names of the materials. matNames != null and ∀x in matNames x!= "".
        prices - Integer 2D array that holds 3 arrays, one for each hardware shop, which contain the prices of the materials. prices != null and ∀x in prices x!= String.

      • calcTotalPrice

        public static int[] calcTotalPrice(java.util.Scanner in,
                                   int[][] prices,
                                   int[][] quantityPurpose)
        Calculates the total prices per hardware shop.
        pre: The array prices should be properly initialized.
        post: The method will return the array containing the total pricing for each hardware shop.
        Parameters:
        in - Scanner object that allows input to be captured. in != null.
        prices - Integer 2D array that holds 3 arrays, one for each hardware shop, which contain the prices of the materials. prices != null && ∀x in prices x != String.
        quantityPurpose - Integer 2D array that holds 2 arrays, one with the quantity and the other with the purpose of each material. quantityPurpose != null && ∀x in quantityPurpose x != String.
